name: podcondition-v1
description: PodCondition contains details for the current condition of this pod.

message.description: Human-readable message indicating details about last transition.

reason.description: Unique, one-word, CamelCase reason for the condition's last transition.

status.description: Status is the status of the condition. Can be True, False, Unknown. More info: http://kubernetes.io/docs/user-guide/pod-states#pod-conditions

type.description: Type is the type of the condition. Currently only Ready. More info: http://kubernetes.io/docs/user-guide/pod-states#pod-conditions
